---
id: request-email-security-code
title: "Email (Request)"
description: "Request a security code for a user, identified by their e-mail which can then be [exchanged](/restapi/docs/exchange-email-security-code) for an access token. To use this functionality you *must* use your games api_key from your games profile on mod.io. A Successful request will return a [Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/message-object)."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Email (Request)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/oauth/emailrequest"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Request a security code for a user, identified by their e-mail which can then be [exchanged](/restapi/docs/exchange-email-security-code) for an access token. To use this functionality you *must* use your games api_key from your games profile on mod.io. A Successful request will return a [Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/message-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Email Authentication Request","required":["email"],"properties":{"email":{"description":"An email address the user can access to retrieve the security code. This parameter should also be urlencoded before the request is sent.","type":"string","example":"someperson@someservice.com"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Email Request Response","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":201},"message":{"example":"Please enter the 5-digit security code sent to your email address (someperson@someservice.com)."}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"error_auth_failed_limited_key_abilities","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"11017":"error_auth_failed_limited_key_abilities"}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
